name: Singularika
description:
We sell possibilities for your business, virtual assistants are for free!
We create virtual assistants and chatbots related projects of any level of complexity: 
1) Chatbots for any messengers with opened APIs (FB Messenger, Kik, Telegram, Slack, Skype, Viber, Line, etc.); 
2) SMS chatbots; 
3) Chatbot for websites and mobile apps;
4) Chatbots as a part of big projects with dashboard, analytics, different API ERP and CRM integration and standalone dialog systems projects.
5) Integration of Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning features;
6) QA and technical documentation for 3rd party solutions.
Virtual assistants portfolio
We provide full circle of a project development: technical specification, dialogues design, front-end and back-end, building database, QA, Project management, hosting, different APIs and payment gateways integration. 
Our expertise:
PHP, Node JS, Python, Java, Telegram Bot Platform, FB Messenger API, Skype API, Viber API,  Slack, Dialogflow (ex-APi.ai), Platform-O, AIML 1.0./2.0, R, Tensorflow, Watson IBM, Bluemix, botpress.io, Microsoft bot framework
Our engineers are highly qualified in dealing with databases: MySQL, Postgresql, MongoDB, FireBird, AWS Lambda, Redis.
In front-end we're experienced in Angular2, React.js, NodeJS, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, SASS, Foundation, Jade(Pug), Lodash templating engine, Ajax, NPM
